None Shall Pass.name: None Shall Pass
None Shall Pass.flavor: You contain two foes instead of just one with your divine challenge.
None Shall Pass.effect: Until the end of the encounter, every use of your divine challenge targets two enemies rather than one.

Certain Justice.name: Certain Justice
Certain Justice.flavor: You call upon your devotion to law to make your attack strike true.
Certain Justice.onHit: 1[W] damage. If the target is marked by you, it is also weakened and dazed until it is not marked by you.

Rule of Order.name: Rule of Order
Rule of Order.flavor: You invoke order through your weapon, causing it to glow as you deliver a punishing blow against an enemy.
Rule of Order.special: If the target has scored a critical hit against you or your allies in this encounter, your attack gains a +2 power bonus and deals +2d10 radiant damage.
Rule of Order.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is weakened (save ends).
Rule of Order.onMiss: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
